name: God's Intern
description:
You know the feeling. Its the first day on a new job. The boss is stressed out and barely have time to give you any instructions. In this case your boss is God himself. Welcome to Heaventerprise! God wants you to take over the creation of animals while hes away. The problem is that he only left simple recipes for you on how to assemble them. A dog consists of 1x head, 4x Legs and a torso. Good luck! 

Controls:

Push the screen for the pieces to move away 

Swipe and the pieces on each side of the motion will move towards each other.

For WebGL try it here: http://rasmusnagel.com/Gods%20Intern/index.html
